word_mean: 成熟，成熟期：达到最大发育程度的时期
又称“性成熟期（mature stage）”。根据性腺外表性状和性细胞发育程度划分的性腺发育阶段。

sentence.Network_en: Lacking self-confidence and maturity, many teenagers are left feeling very vulnerable.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多十几岁的孩子既缺乏自信又不够懂事，所以感情上十分脆弱。

sentence.Network_en: Girls generally reach sexual maturity two years earlier than boys.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常女孩性发育成熟要比男孩早两年。

sentence.Network_en: Customers are told what their policies will be worth on maturity.
sentence.Network_cn: 客户被告知保险单到期时的价值。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin maturitas, from maturus (see mature)

entry.def: Maturity is the state of being fully developed or adult.

example.ex: Humans experience a delayed maturity; we arrive at all stages of life later than other mammals.
example.tran: 人类发育较缓——在生命的各个阶段，我们都晚于其他哺乳动物。

entry.def: Someone's maturity is their quality of being fully developed in their personality and  emotional behaviour.

example.ex: Her speech showed great maturity and humanity...
example.tran: 她的演讲非常老练，极富人情味。

example.ex: Lacking self-confidence and maturity, many teenagers are left feeling very vulnerable.
example.tran: 许多十几岁的孩子既缺乏自信又不够懂事，所以感情上十分脆弱。

entry.def: When an investment such as a savings policy or pension plan reaches maturity, it reaches the stage when you stop paying money and the company pays you back the money you have saved, and the interest your money has earned.

example.ex: Customers are told what their policies will be worth on maturity...
example.tran: 客户被告知保险单到期时的价值。

example.ex: Treasury bonds have maturities that extend out as far as 25 years or more.
example.tran: 国库券的到期时间长达25年甚至更久。

means.word_mean: 1. the period of time in your life after your physical growth has stopped and you are fully developed
2. state of being mature; full development
3. the date on which a financial obligation must be repaid

auth_sentence.content: Umpqua extended the maturity to May 31, 2008.

Sentence.sentence: The first is"If I purchase a corporate bond,do I have to hold it until the maturity date?

sentences.en: These latest paintings show how the artist has really grown in maturity.
sentences.cn: 这些最新的画作显示画家已经真正地步向成熟了。

sentences.en: These plants ought to reach maturity after five years.
sentences.cn: 这些植物五年后就该长成了。

sentences.en: These youngsters are advancing towards maturity.
sentences.cn: 这些青年人正在逐渐成熟。
